title: 注意，港大研究生會AGM 改期，各位巴絲，14/7見！留力過西九撐77遊行！

replies.msg:
班大陸研究生凌晨3時靜雞雞通改期去14日！

記住今日唔好入港大，保留體力過去西九撐77遊行


各號請mark低14/7下午2時先至去港大


The membership of the Association shall include the following three classes:
a) ASSOCIATE MEMBERSHIP
All current postgraduate students of the University are admitted as PGSA Associate Members
automatically. The Associate Membership of a student will be upgraded to Full Membership
right after the student has submitted the application form and paid the admission fee;
b) FULL MEMBERSHIP
Full Membership is open for application by any current postgraduate student of the
University. Full Membership will expire right after the student graduates from the University;

應該讀緊full-time, part-time都自動係associate membership!

The members of the Association shall have the privileges described as follow:
a) Associate Members have the rights to vote in the Annual Election and General Meetings.
Associate Members shall not have the rights to be elected into Executive Committee of PGSA;

有權係AGM 同AE投票！

Details of the Annual General Meeting:
Date: 14 July 2019 (Sunday)
Time: 2:00 PM
Venue: Wang Gungwu Theatre, Graduate House

https://www.pgsa.hku.hk/structure/excos

Li Jingxian, Zhang Runzhi, Wei Yichen, Zheng Huili, Pan Zhijun, Zhu Bohao, Wang Yuchen, Wu Di, Yu Zhige, Lian Zhihui, Shi Jingjing, Han Chen, Zhang Zhening, Feng Zechu, Zhang Naiwen, Deng Shuyu, Feng Ye
